name: The Lightning Strikes Again
description:
My small contribution to the Cyberpunk Jam 2014 created using RPG Maker VX Ace with Futuristic Tiles pack and Futuristic Atmospeheres (by Joel Steudler)

Additional Music:

Lightning Strikes Again by Dokken

Aerodynamic by Daft Punk

Discovering by Solar Fields

Mechanical Animals by Marilyn Manson

Endless Pursuer & Pleasure of Tension

(from The Snatcher OST) by Konami Kukeiha Club

First Death in the Family by Future Sound of London
